properties.name: textfield
properties.description: Form element for single line raw text.
properties.parameters: [["Size","Value","L","Determines the size of the input field. Can be on of 'S', 'M', 'L', 'XL', 'XXL'. "]]
properties.examples:
Name = textfield

Title = textfield M

Short Title
properties.examplescomment:
The textfield form element is the default form element for any property.
 So you don't have to specify it explicitly, a cmdl line like Short Title is perfectly valid.
